mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_return_list_goods (GOODS_ID, GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_MODEL, GOODS_UNIT, GOODS_NUM, PRICE, TOTAL, RETURN_LIST_ID, GOODS_TYPE_ID)
VALUES
(#{good.goodsId},#{good.goodsCode},#{good.goodsName},#{good.goodsModel},#{good.goodsUnit},#{good.goodsNum},#{good.price}, #{good.total},#{returnListId},#{good.goodsTypeId})
